entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lincoln
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:23 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vineland Station 02:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: NW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of rain beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain. Windy. High 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
